location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© D'Affairs at Tehran, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns Government finances. Stannus writes that he has disposed of bills on the Bombay Government to the amount of 50,000 rupees, adding that Bengal bills are not saleable at present, 'except at a very considerable loss'.
